languages.text: С лязгом рассыпались лезвия и шипы, обратились в ржу. Ибо жажда крови делает клинок слабее, и Домин доказал{mf||а} это.
The blades and the spikes fell, clanging, and turned to rust. For bloodlust weakens a blade, and the Domin had proved as much.
languages.original_text: С лязгом рассыпались лезвия и шипы, обратились в ржу. Ибо жажда крови делает клинок слабее, и Домин доказал{mf||а} это.

traits.locale_text: The blades and the spikes fell apart, clanging, and turned to rust. For bloodlust weakens a blade, and the Enim had proved as much.
The blades and the spikes fell apart, clanging, and turned to rust. For bloodlust weakens a blade, and the Enim had proved as much.
The blades and the spikes fell, clanging, and turned to rust. For bloodlust weakens a blade, and the Enim had proved as much.
The blades and the spikes fell, clanging, and turned to rust. For bloodlust weakens a blade, and the Enim had proved as much.
The blades and the spikes fell, clanging, and turned to rust. For bloodlust weakens a blade, and the Domin had proved as much.
The blades and the spikes fell, clanging, and turned to rust. For bloodlust weakens a blade, and the Domin had proved as much.

languages.text: Die Klingen und die Stacheln fielen klirrend zu Boden und wurden zu Rost. Denn Blutlust schwächt eine Klinge, und {mf|der|die} Domin bewies das.
languages.original_text: The blades and the spikes fell, clanging, and turned to rust. For bloodlust weakens a blade, and the Domin had proved as much.

traits.locale_text: Die Klingen und die Stacheln fielen klirrend zu Boden und wurden zu Rost. Denn Blutlust schwächt eine Klinge, und {mf|der|die} Domin bewies das.
Die Klingen und die Stacheln fielen klirrend zu Boden und verwandelten sich in Rost. Denn Blutlust schwächt eine Klinge, und {mf|der|die} Enim bewies das.

languages.text: Las hojas y las espinas cayeron con estruendo y se convirtieron en óxido, pues la sed de sangre debilita la hoja, como había demostrado {mf|el|la} Domin.
languages.original_text: The blades and the spikes fell, clanging, and turned to rust. For bloodlust weakens a blade, and the Domin had proved as much.

traits.locale_text: Las hojas y las espinas cayeron con estruendo y se convirtieron en óxido, pues la sed de sangre debilita la hoja, como había demostrado {mf|el|la} Domin.
Las hojas y las espinas cayeron con estruendo y se convirtieron en óxido, pues la sed de sangre debilita la hoja, como había demostrado {mf|el|la} Enim.

languages.text: 刃ととげは音を立てて落ち、錆ついた。血への渇望が刃を弱くするということを、ドミンはしっかりと証明した。
languages.original_text: The blades and the spikes fell, clanging, and turned to rust. For bloodlust weakens a blade, and the Domin had proved as much.

traits.locale_text: 刃ととげは音を立てて落ち、錆ついた。血への渇望が刃を弱くするということを、エニムはしっかりと証明した。

languages.text: 利刃与尖刺纷纷落下，叮当作响，变成了铁锈。对鲜血的渴望会让利刃变钝，而秘者证实了这一点。
languages.original_text: The blades and the spikes fell, clanging, and turned to rust. For bloodlust weakens a blade, and the Domin had proved as much.

traits.locale_text: 利刃与尖刺纷纷落下，叮当作响，变成了铁锈。对鲜血的渴望会让利刃变钝，而秘者证实了这一点。
利刃与尖刺纷纷落下，叮当作响，变成了铁锈。对鲜血的渴望会让利刃变钝，而秘者证实了这一点。

languages.text: À peine les lames et les pointes avaient-elles touché le sol qu'elles se couvrirent de rouille. {mf|Le|La} Domin venait de prouver que, contrairement à ce que l'on pourrait croire, la soif de sang émousse les lames.
languages.original_text: The blades and the spikes fell, clanging, and turned to rust. For bloodlust weakens a blade, and the Domin had proved as much.

traits.locale_text: À peine les lames et les pointes avaient-elles touché le sol qu'elles se couvrirent de rouille. {mf|Le|La} Domin venait de prouver que, contrairement à ce que l'on pourrait croire, la soif de sang émousse les lames.

À peine les lames et les pointes avaient-elles touché le sol qu'elles se couvrirent de rouille. L'Enim venait de prouver que, contrairement à ce que l'on pourrait croire, la soif de sang émousse les lames.

languages.text: Saldırıya geçen bıçaklar ve dikenler, çınlayıp bir anda pas tuttu. Çünkü kana susamışlık, kılıcı zayıflatır. Domin de bunun kanıtıdır.
languages.original_text: The blades and the spikes fell, clanging, and turned to rust. For bloodlust weakens a blade, and the Domin had proved as much.
